com.fwdekker.randomness

Class SettingsDialog<S extends Settings>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.ui.DialogWrapper
      • com.fwdekker.randomness.SettingsDialog<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of settings managed by the subclass
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SettingsManager<S>

    public abstract class SettingsDialog<S extends Settings>
extends com.intellij.openapi.ui.DialogWrapper
implements SettingsManager<S>
    Superclass for settings dialogs.

    Subclasses MUST call DialogWrapper.init() and loadSettings() in their constructor.
